page_content:
Export To Image

Version:MissionOS_2.0

Various functionalities exist within the graphing section. Click View Large button or click on the graph thumbnail to enlarge the graph. As the graph opens, click the hamburger icon to view the different graphing options available. You can export images in PNG format by selecting the corresponding buttons – Export to PNG (small) and Export to PNG (large). Click these options to download the corresponding images of the graph.

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on Export to Image functionality, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

videos.title: How To: Export Graphs to Image in MissionOS
